text: Awa on yi'ii ko oo sokola mo Alla yiɗi waɗi e mon kon: ɗun ko wakkilaare, e faale danditagol tooɲe, e ko tikkuɗon kon, e ko ŋalɗuɗon fii bone waɗaaɗo on, e faale mon moƴƴo fii yi'itugol lan, e cataare mon nden, e hebulaare mon nden fii donkingol bonnuɗo on. On holliri noone fow wonde on tawaaka e nduu muraadu.
